translated: Alexander Fleming was born August 6, 1881 in Ayrshire (Scotland) and died 11 March 1955 in London (United Kingdom) is a famous physician, bacteriologist and Scottish pharmacologist.
original: Alexander Fleming né le 6 août 1881 à Ayrshire (Écosse) et mort le 11 mars 1955 à Londres (Royaume-Uni) est un célèbre médecin, bactériologiste et pharmacologue écossais.
